title: Government launches new health scheme
author: John Smith
text: The government announced a new healthcare scheme to provide free treatment.
label: REAL

title: Celebrity spotted on Mars
author: Anonymous
text: A famous celebrity was reportedly seen on Mars last night.
label: FAKE

title: Scientists discover water on Moon
author: Dr. A. Kumar
text: NASA scientists confirm discovery of water on the lunar surface.
label: REAL

title: Cure for cancer found overnight
author: Unknown
text: A local person claims to have discovered a cure for cancer instantly.

author: Jane Doe
text: The stock market reached an all-time high today.
label: REAL

author: Unknown
text: Aliens have landed in central park and started talking with people.

title: COVID vaccine approved globally
author: Dr. Mehta

title: Man runs faster than car
author: Anonymous
text: Local boy claims he can outrun cars on the highway.
